metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13231 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Cacti before 1.2.11, auth_profile.php?action=edit allows CSRF for an admin email change.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13231` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ccdm94> the fix present in 107bfecebfd seems to be incomplete. The patch in 25abe644837, which also addresses CVE-2020-13230, includes fixes that also address this CVE.

criterions.comment: cacti package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
